data.text:
@RogerMarshallMD @DrOzCMS Vulnerable children?

You’re silent and complicit in your silence about the abuse of 100s-more-children victimized by Epstein and his sick buddy boys and going along with trumps cover up.
@RogerMarshallMD @DrOzCMS What about Trump’s  tariffs and the plight of Kansas farmers?   What are you doing about it?
@RogerMarshallMD @DrOzCMS You too are a piece of shit that disobeys Jesus’ commandments
@RogerMarshallMD @DrOzCMS He faced scrutiny over a ‘08 reckless-driving conviction that was reduced to a minor infraction with help from a prosecutor connected to his business partner.

@RogerMarshallMD @DrOzCMS As a congressman, Marshall drew backlash for remarks suggesting some poor patients “just don’t want health care,” which critics found insensitive and dismissive of people relying on Medicaid

@RogerMarshallMD @DrOzCMS Marshall violated the STOCK Act — a federal law meant to prevent conflicts of interest — by disclosing stock transactions by a dependent late (up to 17 months after they occurred), raising concerns about transparency in financial disclosures by a member of Congress
